languages.text: {n}Звездная гавань встречает вас грохотом снарядов и щекочущим ноздри запахом взрывчатки. Из-за дыма сложно понять, кто и по кому стреляет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Космопорт встречает вас грохотом снарядов и щекочущим ноздри запахом взрывчатки. Из-за шума и дыма сложно понять, кто именно стреляет, откуда и почему. Когда стрельба ненадолго прерывается, вы слышите хриплый крик.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The starport greets you with the din of ordnance and the smell of explosives tickles your nostrils. It is difficult to tell through the smoke who is firing at whom.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Звездная гавань встречает вас грохотом снарядов и щекочущим ноздри запахом взрывчатки. Из-за дыма сложно понять, кто и по кому стреляет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The starport greets you with the din of ordnance and the smell of explosives tickling your nostrils. It is difficult to tell who is firing on whom in all the smoke.{/n}
{n}The starport greets you with the din of ordnance and the smell of explosives tickling your nostrils. It is difficult to tell who is firing on whom in all the smoke.{/n}
{n}The starport greets you with the din of ordnance and the smell of explosives tickling your nostrils. It is difficult to tell who is firing where with all the smoke.{/n}
{n}The starport greets you with the din of ordnance and the smell of explosives tickling your nostrils. It is difficult to tell who is firing where with all the smoke.{/n}
{n}The starport greets you with the din of ordnance and the smell of explosives tickles your nostrils. It is difficult to tell through the smoke who is firing at whom.{/n}
{n}The starport greets you with the din of ordnance and the smell of explosives tickles your nostrils. It is difficult to tell through the smoke who is firing at whom.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Raumhafen begrüßt dich mit dem Lärm von Schüssen und dem Geruch von Sprengstoff, der in deinen Nasenlöchern kitzelt. Bei all dem Rauch lässt sich schwer sagen, wer von wo aus wohin schießt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The starport greets you with the din of ordnance and the smell of explosives tickles your nostrils. It is difficult to tell through the smoke who is firing at whom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Raumhafen begrüßt dich mi dem Lärm von Schüssen und dem Geruch von Sprengstoff, der in deinen Nasenlöchern kitzelt. Bei all dem Rauch lässt sich schwer sagen, wer von wo aus wohin schießt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous arrivez à l'astroport sous un tonnerre de tirs d'artillerie et de fumée d'explosions, à tel point qu'il est difficile de discerner qui tire sur qui.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The starport greets you with the din of ordnance and the smell of explosives tickles your nostrils. It is difficult to tell through the smoke who is firing at whom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous arrivez à l'astroport sous un tonnerre de tirs d'artillerie et de fumée d'explosions, à tel point qu'il est difficile de discerner qui tire sur qui.{/n}

languages.text: {n}星港充斥着军械的轰鸣声与刺鼻的火药味。由于烟雾弥漫，你很难分辨是谁在朝哪边开火。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The starport greets you with the din of ordnance and the smell of explosives tickles your nostrils. It is difficult to tell through the smoke who is firing at whom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}星港充斥着军械的轰鸣声与刺鼻的火药味。由于烟雾弥漫，你很难分辨是谁在朝哪边开火。{/n}

languages.text: {n}スターポートに入ると、騒々しい兵器の音と鼻孔をくすぐる爆発物の臭いで迎えられた。煙の中では、誰が誰に向かって撃っているのか見分けるのは難しい。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The starport greets you with the din of ordnance and the smell of explosives tickles your nostrils. It is difficult to tell through the smoke who is firing at whom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}スターポートに入ると、騒々しい兵器の音と鼻孔をくすぐる爆発物の臭いで迎えられた。煙が立ち込めて、どこに誰が発砲しているか見分けるのは難しい。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El puerto estelar te recibe con el estruendo de la artillería y el olor de los explosivos cosquilleándote la nariz. Con tanto humo, es difícil saber quién está disparando a quién.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The starport greets you with the din of ordnance and the smell of explosives tickles your nostrils. It is difficult to tell through the smoke who is firing at whom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El puerto estelar te recibe con el estruendo de la artillería y el olor de los explosivos haciéndote cosquillas en las fosas nasales. Es difícil saber quién está disparando y dónde con todo el humo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yıldız limanı seni ağır topların gümbürtüleriyle karşılıyor. Patlayıcı kokusu burun deliklerini gıdıklıyor. Duman perdesi yüzünden kimin kime ateş ettiğini anlamak güç.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The starport greets you with the din of ordnance and the smell of explosives tickles your nostrils. It is difficult to tell through the smoke who is firing at whom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yıldız limanı seni ağır topların gümbürtüleriyle karşılıyor. Patlayıcı kokusu burun deliklerini gıdıklıyor. Duman perdesi yüzünden kimin kime ateş ettiğini anlamak güç.{/n}
